name: Craft torch
goal: Craft torches from coal or charcoal and sticks
notes: Torches provide light level 14, preventing hostile mob spawning in a radius around them. Essential for mining and shelter safety. Each craft yields 4 torches. Coal is mined from coal ore with any pickaxe. Charcoal is made by smelting logs in a furnace. Can be crafted in the 2x2 player crafting grid — no crafting table needed. Torches can be placed on walls and floors. Soul torches (using soul sand/soul soil instead of coal) provide dimmer light (10) but repel piglins.

steps.title: Obtain coal or charcoal
steps.details: Mine coal ore with any pickaxe to get coal (coal ore appears as stone with black specks, found at Y=0 to Y=320 but most common at Y=96). Alternatively, smelt any log in a furnace to get charcoal (1 log = 1 charcoal). Coal and charcoal are interchangeable for torches.
checks: Have at least 1 coal or 1 charcoal in inventory

steps.title: Obtain sticks
steps.details: You need 1 stick per 4 torches. Craft from 2 planks (yields 4 sticks). Skip if you already have sticks.
checks: Have at least 1 stick in inventory

steps.title: Craft torches
steps.details: Place 1 coal or charcoal on top and 1 stick below it (vertically). No crafting table required — works in 2x2 grid. Yields 4 torches. Recipe: { "recipe": "torch", "count": 4 }.
checks: Torches appear in inventory (4 per craft)
